review: Cool idea, but the video quality has been extremely laggy more often than not, especially when attempting to stream full-screen video. The fact that it's tied to the Chrome browser rather than the OS makes it fairly limited compared to the functionality of competing devices (Apple TV, for example).
author: Jason Machacek

review: Bought this for my boyfriend, he loves it!
author: Chirriluv

review: Does everything as promised... Wish it could stream from internet to the chromecast but it wasn't advertised to do so... And even with some recent ways to get around it it's not that stable and can skip over wifi... Otherwise makes my TVs smart without having to upgrade! :)
author: Jen
